data.actual_result: I am unable to send messages
data.expected_result: The user should be able to send messages with slowmode and rate limiting not affecting them.
data.short_description: Sending a lot of messages till the point of rate limiting, and toggling slowmode makes you unable to send messages
data.steps_to_repro: - send a bunch of messages till you get rate limited - toggle slow mode on, then off - the user will be unable to send messages, even with rate limitting and slowmode not preventing them
